name: Between The Devil and The Deep
name_original: Between The Devil and The Deep
description:
Between The Devil and The Deep is solo-developed visual-rich experience where you take on the role of a scientific diver and explore the unknown depths of The Devil's Hole for the first time in human history. If you enjoy marine life or dark caves, play and see what lies in the deep.

Note from the developer: Hi! This was the first game I've ever made and I did during the wee hours of the night after my day-job. It was a passion-project and a real labor of love, so any feedback or commentary would really mean the world to me!
